entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
